    root: cva([\r
        "UI-Combobox__root",\r
        "justify-between h-auto",\r
    ], {\r
        variants: {\r
            size: {\r
                sm: "min-h-8 px-2 py-1 text-sm",\r
                md: "min-h-10 px-3 py-2 ",\r
                lg: "min-h-12 px-4 py-3 text-md",\r
            },\r
        },\r
    }),\r
    popover: cva([\r
        "UI-Combobox__popover",\r
        "w-[--radix-popover-trigger-width] p-0",\r
    ]),\r
    checkIcon: cva([\r
        "UI-Combobox__checkIcon",\r
        "h-4 w-4",\r
        "data-[selected=true]:opacity-100 data-[selected=false]:opacity-0",\r
    ]),\r
    item: cva([\r
        "UI-Combobox__item",\r
        "flex gap-1 items-center bg-gray-100 dark:bg-gray-800 px-2 pr-1 rounded-[--radius] line-clamp-1 max-w-96",\r
    ]),\r
    placeholder: cva([\r
        "UI-Combobox__placeholder",\r
        "text-[--muted] truncate",\r
    ]),\r
    inputValuesContainer: cva([\r
        "UI-Combobox__inputValuesContainer",\r
        "grow flex flex-wrap gap-2",\r
    ]),\r
    chevronIcon: cva([\r
        "UI-Combobox__chevronIcon",\r
        "ml-2 h-4 w-4 shrink-0 opacity-50",\r
    ]),\r
    removeItemButton: cva([\r
        "UI-Badge__removeItemButton",\r
        "text-lg cursor-pointer transition ease-in hover:opacity-60",\r
    ]),\r
